channel.title: Runescape weapon and food timers?
channel.description: yeah on my server i wanna get runescape weapon and food timers, but i dont know how does anyone have a tutorial on it?

item.title: Runescape weapon and food timers?
item.dc:creator: @zammyking111 zammyking111
item.description:
@zammyking111 wrote:

Open client.java search for

loopAttDelay = pkingDelay+10;

replace with…

loopAttDelay = pkingDelay+7;

search for loopAttDelay = pkingDelay+10; until all of them done!

LoopAttDelay = PkingDelay
Add a +7 to the end of those.

to make them slightly slower or faster, you change the pkingDelay = part underneath the weapon id, eg…

if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4151) { pkingDelay = 6; //change here wepDelay = 6; //leave this }

Now look once you have all those search

loopAttDelay = pkingDelay
And add a +7 after those aswell.

Read full topic
